DOC.brief_summary: This study compares cognitive function after carotid endarterectomy and stenting.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Cognitive Function After Carotid Endarterectomy and Stenting
DOC.criteria: Carotid artery occlusive disease, asymptomatic greater than 80% with CTA or carotid duplex Contraindication for carotid endarterectomy or stenting
